column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place confused me when I walked in
column3: but the pastries speak for themselves. They are amazing. They're beautiful
column4: they're inventive and they're absolutely delicious. If you love pastry you have to go here. The variety of pastries change. One time they had a pistachio/raspberry tart
column5: another time they had a passion fruit pastry or a lemon tart or a chocolate tart and they were all good. The almond croissant was delicious and I am not usually a fan of croissants. The hot chocolate was just OK. Oatmeal cream cookie
